titleStmt.title: Thule, or Vertues historie To the honorable and vertuous Mistris Amy Audely. By F.R. The first booke.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kingston, for Humfrey Lownes,

notesStmt.note: The second book has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Variant: title page has author's name in full.
Reproduction of a photostat of he original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
